name: varshavijayan.github.io
body:
### About Me
I’m an algorithm development engineering intern at [Edwards Lifesciences](http://www.edwards.com/Pages/Default.aspx), working in the domain of data analytics for healthcare. I graduated with a Master’s in [Bioengineering](http://be.ucsd.edu/) from [University of California, San Diego](http://ucsd.edu/) (UCSD!) in June 2014. My technical background entails medical signal/ image processing, data analysis/ statistical inference & medical device development.
As an engineer by training, I am passionate about prognosticating, coming up with preventive
actions, improving the existing conditions of & solving persisting problems plaguing our society,
specifically in the health sector. One of my long-term goals is to mine data to make a difference in
building goal-specific, affordable products that are accessible by everyone.
In addition to these, I enjoy critical reading, writing & hiking. I also have a penchant for
understanding how the brain works.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
